question: World Consumer Rights Day was observed on __________.
explanation: World Consumer Rights Day was observed all over the world on 15th March every year to create awareness about consumer rights. World Consumer Rights Day was inspired by President John F Kennedy. He sent a special message on issues of consumer rights to the US Congress on 15th March 1962. The first World Consumer Rights Day was celebrated in 1983. Theme: "Making Digital Marketplaces Fairer" is the theme for World Consumer Rights Day 2018.
